workExperience.title: Software Engineering Intern
workExperience.roledesc: Build and maintained key features for Tesla's internal application for vehicle insurance. Worked closely with cross-functional teams including developers, designers and product managers to ship end to end digital products.

workExperience.title: Software Designer
workExperience.roledesc: Solved bugs, and optimized the dashboard layout while working with multiple teams and the vehicle driver. Implemented additional functionalities on dashboard boot-up.

blogData.title: So you think you can frontend ?
blogData.desc: “computer scientists stand on each other’s toes”, my thoughts on the state of frontend during the AI doom.
